mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where status = 'Y'
select notice_no , user_id , notice_title , notice_date , count from notice join member using(user_no) where notice.status = 'Y' order by notice_no desc
select notice_no , user_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_date , count from notice join member using(user_no) where notice.status = 'Y' and notice_no = #{nno}
mapper.update: update notice set count = count + 1 where notice_no = #{nno} and status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select nco_no , user_id , nco_comment , to_char(nco_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "nco_date" from ncomments join member using(user_no) where notice_no = #{nno} and ncomments.status = 0 order by nco_no desc
